column2: Projectiles will have arcs of lightning surging between them (requires 2 projectile spells)
Projectiles will have arcs of fire burning between them (requires 2 projectile spells)
Projectiles will have arcs of gunpowder flowing between them (requires 2 projectile spells)
Projectiles will have arcs of poison flowing between them (requires 2 projectile spells)
A giant, deadly energy cross that explodes after a short time
Surrounds the projectile with an energy field that constantly deals 3.5 damage to nearby creatures
Create a mighty rock out of thin air
Call a familiar to your aid!
A more powerful version of Spitter bolt
A more powerful version of Spitter bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out
The most powerful version of Spitter bolt
The most powerful version of Spitter bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out
Transmutes various liquids and powdery substances into something else
Any toxic sludge within range of the projectile turns into acid
Summon a possessed wand to aid you
Transmutes everything in a short radius into gold, including walls, creatures... and you
Transmutes everything in a short radius into water, including walls, creatures... and you
Transmutes everything in a short radius into oil, including walls, creatures... and you
Transmutes everything in a short radius into alcohol, including walls, creatures... and you
Transmutes everything in a short radius into blood, including walls, creatures... and you
Transmutes everything in a short radius into smoke, including walls, creatures... and you
Instantly decimate foes around you, at the cost of your maximum HP
Projectiles caught within the field transform into harmless critters
Causes the projectile to fly chaotically wherever it wishes
Projectiles caught within the field transform into blasts of lightning
Projectiles caught within the field are attracted towards its center
After a short time, the projectile aims straight downwards
After a short time, the projectile aims straight upwards
Forces the projectile to fly horizontally but increases its damage
A pinpointed, short-ranged beam of concentrated light
A pinpointed, short-ranged beam of concentrated light that casts another spell after a timer runs out
Causes the projectile to explode upon collision with a creature covered in slime
Causes the projectile to explode powerfully upon collision with a creature covered in slime
Causes the projectile to explode upon collision with a creature covered in alcohol
Causes the projectile to explode powerfully upon collision with a creature covered in alcohol
Causes creatures hit by the projectile to cast fireballs in random directions
Causes the projectile to cast lightning in random directions as it flies
Causes creatures hit by the projectile to cast lightning in random directions
Causes the projectile to cast tentacles in random directions as it flies
Causes creatures hit by the projectile to rapidly grow tentacles in random directions
Charms creatures covered in toxic sludge hit by the projectile
Opens a one-way portal to a sinister realm
Any hard, solid materials within range of the projectile turns into sand
Causes creatures hit by the projectile to gain a gravity well that draws projectiles in; dissipates eventually
Summon an otherwise empty egg that casts a spell upon cracking open
Increases the duration of the projectile so that it lasts longer
Immediately adds 30 mana to the wand
The projectile lasts only a very short amount of time, but deals more damage
Creates a thin, horizontal barrier that harms passing creatures, including you
Creates a thin, vertical barrier that harms passing creatures, including you
Creates a thin, square-shaped barrier that harms passing creatures, including you
Small explosions appear randomly over a large area
The projectile moves considerably faster, but deals less damage
Any projectiles shot alongside the command bolt will be attracted to it. Casts 3 extra spells upon being cast
Summons a large, serrated disc with a curious flight pattern
Any time the projectile would bounce, it also explodes
If the projectile would move downwards, it separates into a bundle of 5 explosive bolts
The projectile flies through enemies. Can hit the caster.
The projectile flies slowly through the ground
A static, magical phenomenon that casts 3 extra spells after a short while
A static, magical phenomenon that casts 3 extra spells if an enemy approaches it
The projectile shies away from obstacles
The projectile lasts for a shorter duration
Casts a spell some distance away from the caster
Casts a spell from the closest enemy
The projectile has a much lower cast delay, but gains a lot of spread
Fires a mysterious bolt that jumps from enemy to enemy
Throws a bomb that explodes into volatile fragments
Projectile constantly fires two small fireballs perpendicular to its trajectory
Causes the projectile to fly back and forth
The projectile floats above the ground
After a period of time, you'll be returned to where you cast this spell
Hearts bestow double the maximum HP.
From now on, you will find an extra perk in every Holy Mountain.
When you pick a perk, there's a 50% chance the others won't disappear.
Creatures in the world are more aggressive towards each other.
Creatures in the world are more friendly towards each other.
You're allies with a random enemy group.
You're allies with a random enemy group.
Your kicks deal extra damage and knockback.
Most projectiles are repulsed by your presence, but you take slightly more projectile damage.
You bleed slime, but slime no longer slows you down.
Your HP has been multiplied but you can no longer regain HP.
Gold that you've seen no longer disappears over time.
Your spells knock enemies back more.
Your spells have lower spread but they push you back more.
Almost all your spells bounce around.
Almost all your spells arc towards you; you have higher projectile resistance.
Worms of the world come to you.
Worms of the world run from you.
You call a monstrous tentacle against those who harm you.
You grow curious additional limbs that fight for you.
Enemies that die near you spawn hungry rats to serve your bidding.
You grow weird and disturbing looking limbs that fight for you.
Adds a random spell as Always Cast to the equipped wand.
From now on there are no more shuffling wands. Also converts equipped wands to non shufflers.
You regain health from drinking blood, but you lose one third of maximum health. Blood doesn not affect satiation level.

column5: Recuperas salud bebiendo sangre, pero pierdes un tercio de tu salud máxima.
column6: Du erhältst LP zurück, wenn du Blut trinkst, aber du verlierst ein Drittel deines maximalen Lebens.
column7: Vous regagnez de la santé en buvant du sang, mais vous perdez un tiers de votre santé maximum.

column2: Empty chunks may appear in the world after loading.\nHeed my warning - this may anger the Gods!\nWould you like to continue?

We've changed the default values of a few settings:
-Input bindings for Throw and Spray have been swapped around.
-Inventory needs to be closed to cast spells.
Would you like to enable the new defaults? These can be changed in the Options menu.
The game will restart due to mod changes.
Increased maximum health to $0 ...with the cost of being cursed!
That is not what you seek!
The four essences reveal their secret
The moon's egg cracks open and its contents have been unlocked
The moon spills and unlocks its inebriating contents
Increased maximum health by $0 and restored health to $1 (regained $2 health)
Seems like the musical energy is gone...

If all the mountains were of silver and gold, what would 
they profit a man who lives in constant fear of death? 
Hence there cannot be in the whole world anything better
than our Medicine, which has power to heal 
all the diseases of the flesh.
The sacrifice of oneself to the pursuit of \nknowledge is the highest tribute to the gods.

None other than you is teacher of the truth,
wherever and from whatever source it is manifest.
 
You hear nothing true from me which you have not first told me.
 
Truth, when did you ever fail to walk with me,
teaching me what to avoid and what to seek....
Without you I could discern none of these things.
Explore a new world.\nThe original Noita experience.
New day, new world.\nSome starting items are randomized.\nEvery player is playing the same seed.

For a more challenging experience.\nUnlock this mode by completing the game.
Play around with magic to your heart's content.\nDeath is not a problem.\nUnlock new spells for this mode by casting them.
Welcome to Noita beta branch!\nNoita is an early access game and this is the beta branch.\nBe warned, the game will probably crash here more than in the master branch.
